ygData.subject: DW Goblins
ygData.msgSnippet: I accidentally erased the message, but in response to Harmonic s statement that he killed 15 this weekend and didn t get a helm, hence his sorry Kenross
ygData.messageBody:
I accidentally erased the message, but in response to Harmonic's
statement that he killed 15 this weekend and didn't get a helm, hence his
"sorry Kenross" remark. Aaaaarghhh! (hehe)

Looks like I may be stuck doing this one this weekend, when I get back!
btw, although my experience is limited to Innoruuk, I think this applies
to other servers (from my observation of the notes on here): I really
like how this class sticks together and helps each other out. I've done
a lot of favors for younger Bards, and I've had a lot of favors done for
me by older Bards (some of them used to be the younger ones,
embarrassingly enough...) I don't really see the same kinship when
playing my other characters (warrior, shaman, enchantress).

I check three things when I get on:
- my friends list
- my guild attendance
- what bards are on in my level range

Kenross Cantoforjado, 40 songs, Innoruuk
(Getting to be quite a few level 50 bards on here)
